body: Ntr faggot is racist against Chinese?

Buddy, Comic Hotmilk is Japanese and it came out first (It was uploaded earlier but you might've ignored it as it was the whole comic rather than just Carn). The Chinese have an increase faster translate speed over English for the average doijin..etc.

Don't know if the condom just broke along the way or the fat ugly guy intentionally made a rip on it before.
Anyways, this is another stupid girl who will not use pills after the deed and let herself be pregnant. She can even have an abortion.
I don't mind Chinese or any sort of language since it's pretty simple to understand especially that it is Carn who made this. A typical Carn plot cycle although it's bothering me a bit since I don't know if the original is Japanese or Chinese since the Chinese version came out first. So is Carn a Chinese?

i do not undetstand some people who are complaining about chinese.we are one of the biggest translators and fans of these manga.if you do not want to see chinese you can just only search "english".asking about removing chinese is very naive.
@call me faggot you are absolutely right

fuck the chinese language. 100% of users here speak english so stop uploading the chinese ones. exception would be if a doujin is only available in chinese then it can be uploaded here. only keep the raw and original and the english translated ones.
